hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\purple{5+5}&\purple{=15}\\
\purple{10}&\purple{=15}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $10$ is not the same as $15$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{7-3}&\pink{=10}\\
\pink{4}&\pink{=10}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $4$ is not the same as $10$.

$\begin{align}
\blue{2+4}&\blue{=6}\\
\blue{6}&\blue{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $6$ is the same as $6$.
